short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a QR code from text input

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QR Code Generator

Description:

QR Code Generator is a versatile and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to convert any text into a QR code quickly and efficiently. With multilingual support and a sleek, intuitive interface, generating QR codes has never been easier.

Features:

Text-to-QR Code Conversion: Simply enter your text in the provided text area and click "Generate" to instantly create a QR code.
Multilingual Support: Automatically detects your system language and supports English, Russian, French, Spanish, and German.
Download QR Codes: Easily download your generated QR code as an image file for sharing or printing.
Character Limit: Input field supports up to 500 characters, ensuring ample space for your messages.
Responsive Design: The extension dynamically adjusts the QR code size to fit within the interface, providing a seamless user experience.
How to Use:

Install the QR Code Generator extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Click on the QR Code Generator icon in your browser toolbar to open the extension popup.
Enter your text in the text area (up to 500 characters).
Click the "Generate" button to create the QR code.
To download the QR code, click the "Download" button that appears below the generated QR code.
Why Choose QR Code Generator?

Ease of Use: Designed with simplicity in mind, our extension allows you to generate QR codes in just a few clicks.
Multilingual: Supports multiple languages, making it accessible to a global audience.
Convenient: No need for external tools or websites; everything is right within your browser.
Support:

If you encounter any issues or have any suggestions for improvements, please feel free to contact us via the support page on the Chrome Web Store.
